sqlMap.select: SELECT pano_order.SN AS ORDER_SN, pano_order.ORDER_TIME, pano_order.`STATUS`, pano_order.USER_SN, pano_order.PAY_MONEY, pano_mem_user.NICK_NAME, pano_order_logtc.SEND FROM pano_order INNER JOIN pano_order_logtc ON pano_order.SN = pano_order_logtc.ORDER_SN INNER JOIN pano_mem_user ON pano_order.USER_SN = pano_mem_user.SN ORDER BY pano_order.ORDER_TIME DESC LIMIT #startIndex#,#pagesize#

SELECT pano_order.SN AS ORDER_SN, pano_order.ORDER_TIME, pano_order.`STATUS`, pano_order.USER_SN, pano_order.PAY_MONEY, pano_order_logtc.SEND, pano_order_logtc.ID AS LOGTC_ID, pano_user_receive_address.PROVINCE, pano_user_receive_address.CITY, pano_user_receive_address.AREA, pano_user_receive_address.STREET, pano_user_receive_address.MOBILE, pano_user_receive_address.BACKUP_MOBILE, pano_mem_user.NICK_NAME FROM pano_order INNER JOIN pano_order_logtc ON pano_order_logtc.ORDER_SN = pano_order.SN INNER JOIN pano_mem_user ON pano_mem_user.SN = pano_order.USER_SN INNER JOIN pano_user_receive_address ON pano_user_receive_address.USER_SN = pano_mem_user.SN WHERE pano_order.SN = #ORDER_SN# AND pano_user_receive_address.`DEFAULT` = 1
select SN,`NAME` from pano_project order by ADD_TIME desc

SELECT pano_order.SN AS ORDER_SN, pano_order.ORDER_TIME, pano_order.`STATUS`, pano_order.USER_SN, pano_order.PAY_MONEY, user.NICK_NAME, orderLogtc.SEND FROM pano_order INNER JOIN pano_order_logtc orderLogtc ON pano_order.SN = orderLogtc.ORDER_SN INNER JOIN pano_mem_user USER ON pano_order.USER_SN = user.SN INNER JOIN pano_order_package orderPackage ON orderPackage.order_sn = pano_order.sn INNER JOIN pano_project_house_package housePackage ON orderPackage.house_package_sn = housePackage.sn INNER JOIN pano_project_house_style hosueStyle ON hosueStyle.sn = housePackage.house_style_sn
1=1
and pano_order.ORDER_TIME=#ORDER_TIME#
and hosueStyle.PROJECT_SN=#PROJECT_SN#
and user.NICK_NAME=#NICK_NAME#

SELECT pano_order.SN AS ORDER_SN, pano_order.`STATUS`, pano_order.USER_SN, pano_order.TOTAL_PRICE, pano_order_logtc.SEND, pano_mem_user.NICK_NAME, pano_project.`NAME` AS PROJECT_NAME, pano_project.SN AS PROJECT_SN, pano_order.ORDER_TIME FROM pano_order INNER JOIN pano_order_logtc ON pano_order.ORDER_NUM = pano_order_logtc.ORDER_SN INNER JOIN pano_mem_user ON pano_order.USER_SN = pano_mem_user.SN INNER JOIN pano_order_item ON pano_order.ORDER_NUM = pano_order_item.ORDER_NUM INNER JOIN pano_product ON pano_order_item.PRODUCT_SN = pano_product.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_style ON pano_product.STYLE_SN = pano_project_style.SN INNER JOIN pano_project ON pano_project_style.PROJECT_SN = pano_project.SN WHERE pano_project.SN=#PROJECT_SN#

SELECT pano_order.SN AS ORDER_SN, pano_order.`STATUS`, pano_order.USER_SN, pano_order.TOTAL_PRICE, pano_order_logtc.SEND, pano_mem_user.NICK_NAME, pano_project.`NAME` AS PROJECT_NAME, pano_project.SN AS PROJECT_SN, pano_order.ORDER_TIME FROM pano_order INNER JOIN pano_order_logtc ON pano_order.ORDER_NUM = pano_order_logtc.ORDER_SN INNER JOIN pano_mem_user ON pano_order.USER_SN = pano_mem_user.SN INNER JOIN pano_order_item ON pano_order.ORDER_NUM = pano_order_item.ORDER_NUM INNER JOIN pano_product ON pano_order_item.PRODUCT_SN = pano_product.SN INNER JOIN pano_project_style ON pano_product.STYLE_SN = pano_project_style.SN INNER JOIN pano_project ON pano_project_style.PROJECT_SN = pano_project.SN WHERE pano_mem_user.NICK_NAME=#NICK_NAME#
